title: Digital Shopping: E-commerce & Checkout

sections.title: Shopping Online
sections.content:
Most shopping now happens on websites and apps.

- **Shopping Cart**: The digital place for your items before you buy.
- **Checkout**: The final step to pay for your items.
- **Promo Code**: A secret word (like SAVE10) for a digital discount.
- **BNPL**: 'Buy Now, Pay Later' (splitting the cost into small parts).

sections.title: Online Checkout Flow
sections.content:
```mermaid
graph LR
    A[View Cart] --> B[Enter Promo Code]
    B --> C[Select Shipping]
    C --> D{Choose Payment}
    D --> E[Digital Wallet]
    D --> F[BNPL / Card]
    E --> G[Order Confirmed!]
    F --> G
```

sections.title: Grammar: Pointing to Digital Items
sections.content:
Use **Demonstratives** to talk about items on your screen or in a shop.

- **This / These** (Near - On your screen right now):
  - *I want to buy **this** laptop.* (Singular)
  - *Look at **these** reviews.* (Plural)

- **That / Those** (Far - In a different tab or shop window):
  - *I like **that** phone in the other store.* (Singular)
  - *Check **those** items in your saved list.* (Plural)

sections.title: Smart Spending Vocabulary
sections.content:
- **Affordable**: A good price that you can pay.
- **Bargain**: A very cheap and good product.
- **Overpriced**: Too expensive (not worth the money).
- **Wishlist**: A list of things you want to buy later.

objectives: Navigate the steps of an online checkout process
Use demonstratives (this, that, these, those) in digital contexts
Identify modern payment options like BNPL and digital wallets
